verses.text: The word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* which came unto Zephaniah the son of Cushi , the son of Gedaliah , the son of Amariah , the son of Hizkiah , in the days of Josiah the son of Amon , king of Judah.

I will utterly consume all \add things\add* from off the land , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 1.2 \ft I will…: Heb. By taking away I will make an end\f*\f + \fr 1.2 \ft the land: Heb. the face of the land\f*

I will consume man and beast ; I will consume the fowls of the heaven , and the fishes of the sea , and the stumblingblocks with the wicked ; and I will cut off man from off the land , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 1.3 \ft stumblingblocks: or, idols\f*

I will also stretch out mine hand upon Judah , and upon all the inhabitants of Jerusalem ; and I will cut off the remnant of Baal from this place , \add and\add* the name of the Chemarims with the priests ;

And them that worship the host of heaven upon the housetops ; and them that worship \add and\add* that swear by the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and that swear by Malcham ;\f + \fr 1.5 \ft by the…: or, to the \+nd LORD\+nd*\f*

And them that are turned back from the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and \add those\add* that have not sought the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, nor enquired for him. \p

Hold thy peace at the presence of the Lord 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*: for the day of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* at hand : for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath prepared a sacrifice , he hath bid his guests.  +  r 1.7  t bid: Heb. sanctified, or, prepared *

And it shall come to pass in the day of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* sacrifice , that I will punish the princes , and the king’s children , and all such as are clothed with strange apparel.\f + \fr 1.8 \ft punish: Heb. visit upon\f*
In the same day also will I punish all those that leap on the threshold , which fill their masters’ houses with violence and deceit.

And it shall come to pass in that day , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add that there shall be\add* the noise of a cry from the fish gate , and an howling from the second , and a great crashing from the hills.
Howl , ye inhabitants of Maktesh , for all the merchant people are cut down ; all they that bear silver are cut off.

And it shall come to pass at that time , \add that\add* I will search Jerusalem with candles , and punish the men that are settled on their lees : that say in their heart , The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will not do good , neither will he do evil.\f + \fr 1.12 \ft settled: Heb. curded, or, thickened\f*

Therefore their goods shall become a booty , and their houses a desolation : they shall also build houses , but not inhabit \add them;\add* and they shall plant vineyards , but not drink the wine thereof. \p

The great day of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* near , \add it is\add* near , and hasteth greatly , \add even\add* the voice of the day of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: the mighty man shall cry there bitterly.
That day \add is\add* a day of wrath , a day of trouble and distress , a day of wasteness and desolation , a day of darkness and gloominess , a day of clouds and thick darkness ,
A day of the trumpet and alarm against the fenced cities , and against the high towers.

And I will bring distress upon men , that they shall walk like blind men , because they have sinned against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and their blood shall be poured out as dust , and their flesh as the dung.

Neither their silver nor their gold shall be able to deliver them in the day of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* wrath ; but the whole land shall be devoured by the fire of his jealousy : for he shall make even a speedy riddance of all them that dwell in the land.
